metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5972 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the nft_inner.c functionalityof netfilter in the Linux kernel. This issue could allow a local user tocrash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
